headline: Is FirstEnergy’s 19.6% 2025 Rally Justified After Recent Utility Sector Rebound?
summary: Wondering if FirstEnergy is a bargain or overpriced right now? You are not alone. Taking a fresh look at the numbers might reveal new insights. The stock has climbed 19.6% year-to-date and delivered a strong 16.9% return over the past year, indicating that market sentiment has been active during this period. FirstEnergy has attracted attention recently as utility stocks have regained favor with investors. This comes after news highlighting the sector’s resilience in turbulent markets and...
